ai-patthana17.5:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.5:0.3_0: Standing on the spot, he depraved:
ai-patthana17.5:1.1_0: Placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana17.5:1.1_4: (This should be expanded in the five unwholesome qualities.)
ai-patthana17.5:2.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana17.5:3.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-patthana17.5:4.1_0: this is not the truth of placing the mind, and keeping it connected. ...
